channel.title: Regression on Satyak's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Regression on Satyak's Portfolio

item.title: Flight Fare Prediction
item.description: Project Summary Flight ticket prices can be something hard to guess, today we might see a price, check out the price of the same flight tomorrow, it will be a different story.

item.title: House Price Prediction
item.description: Project Summary Ask a home buyer to describe their dream house, and they probably won’t begin with the height of the basement ceiling or the proximity to an east-west railroad.

item.title: Hotel Booking Prediction
item.description: Project Summary This data set contains booking information for a city hotel and a resort hotel, and includes information such as when the booking was made, length of stay, the number of adults, children, and/or babies, and the number of available parking spaces, among other things.
